description: This file initializes a vector database, sets up a knowledge base with CSV URLs and metadata, loads the data into the database, and configures an agent with specific filters to query the knowledge base.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database, used for storing and querying vector data.

classes.name: CSVUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base initialized from CSV URLs with associated metadata.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base, capable of filtering and querying data.

methods.name: LanceDb.__init__
methods.description: Constructor for initializing the LanceDb instance with table name and URI.

methods.name: CSVUrlKnowledgeBase.__init__
methods.description: Constructor for initializing the knowledge base with URLs, metadata, and vector database.

methods.name: CSVUrlKnowledgeBase.load
methods.description: Loads all documents from the specified URLs into the vector database, with an option to recreate the database.

methods.name: Agent.__init__
methods.description: Constructor for initializing the agent with knowledge base, search options, and filters.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response from the agent based on a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
